## Sidebar
Under the section **Input**, a user can select a local file via **Choose csv file to upload**. The **separator** used in the csv file can be selected too.
Under the section **Options** a user is able to choose the subset of data to analyse.
Under the last section **How-to** is where the elements of the page are described. A user can also modify the theme of the application

## Main panel
The tab **BUSINESS DATA** exhibits the data in table and graphic views.
The tab **APPLICATION**  describes the functionalities available:
  - Forecast Value Added (FVA)
